DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study demonstrate non-inferiority Straumann Bone Level Ø 3.3 mm NC SLActive Roxolid Implants compare Straumann Bone Level Ø 4.1 mm RC SLActive Roxolid Implants base mean crestal bone level change measure surgery 12 month post-implant placement . The secondary objective assess difference clinical outcome test control implant , include implant success survival , gingival recession , subject satisfaction additional early bone level measurement .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , control , multi-center clinical study . The total study duration patient 12 ± 1 month . Straumann Bone Level implant place pre-molar anterior region mandible maxilla single tooth replacement , follow provisional prosthetic load 25 ± 4 day final prosthetic loading 6 ± 1 month implant loading . In total 6 visit per patient schedule study . Bone level change , implant success survival , gingival recession , subject satisfaction adverse event ( AEs ) assess . The study device CE- ( Conformité Européenne , mean European Conformity ) mark product . Straumann Bone Level implant Ø 3.3 mm NC SLActive Roxolid Straumann Bone Level Ø 4.1 mm RC SLActive implant . Five center USA participate .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must voluntarily sign informed consent form Subjects must males female minimum 20 year age Subjects must single tooth gap premolar anterior region mandible maxilla ( ADA tooth position 413 2029 ; FDI tooth position 1115 , 2125 , 3135 , 4145 ) Subjects must oppose dentition ( natural teeth , fix removable restoration ) Subjects must full mouth plaque score ≤ 25 % , accord O'Leary , time screen Subjects must adequate bone encapsulate implant allow placement Ø 4.1 mm Bone Level Implant . Adequate bone height least 1 mm long length study implant Subjects must substantially heal ( least 16 week tooth extraction ) extraction socket Subjects must commit study require followup visit Subjects must good general health assess Investigator Subjects systemic disease would preclude dental implant surgery ( e.g . serious internal medical problem , disorder bone metabolism , uncontrolled bleeding disorder , weaken immune system , illness require periodic use steroid , uncontrollable endocrine disorder , uncontrolled diabetes ) Subjects contraindication oral surgical procedure ( e.g . inadequate wound heal capacity , poor oral hygiene , maxillary mandibular growth complete , xerostomia ) Subjects mucosal disease ( e.g. , erosive lichen planus ) localize area around study implant site Subjects history local irradiation therapy head/neck area Subjects untreated endodontic lesion untreated periodontal disease adjacent implant site Subjects receive , history receiving , intravenous subcutaneous antiresorptive agent , bisphosphonates Subjects severe bruxing , parafunctional habit , temporomandibular joint dysfunction Subjects exist implant adjacent position plan implant site Subjects require bone augmentation socket graft within 6 month prior surgery Subjects require minimal simultaneous augmentation minimal buccal dehiscence defect ( defect great 3mm height ) Subjects inadequate oral hygiene unmotivated adequate home care Subjects physical mental handicap would interfere ability perform adequate oral hygiene Subjects pregnant intend become pregnant duration study Subjects heavy smoker ( define > 10 cigarette per day > 1 cigar per day ) chew tobacco Subjects abuse alcohol drug Subjects undergone administration investigational device within 30 day enrollment study Subjects condition circumstance , opinion Investigator , would prevent completion study participation interfere analysis study result , history noncompliance unreliability
